title: British influencer dies after falling from 192 meters high Castilla-La Mancha bridge
content: A 26-year-old British influencer died after falling from the 192-metre Castilla-La Mancha Bridge in Spain while making social media content. Accompanied by a 24-year-old, the fatal incident occurred early Sunday. Local authorities, reviewing safety measures, emphasized the prohibition of climbing the bridge. The British Foreign Office is aiding the family.
summary: A 26-year-old British influencer died after falling from the 192-metre Castilla-La Mancha Bridge in Spain while making social media content. Accompanied by a 24-year-old, the fatal incident occurred early Sunday. Local authorities, reviewing safety measures, emphasized the prohibition of climbing the bridge. The British Foreign Office is aiding the family.

title: Lebanon's Nabatiyeh mayor killed in Israeli strikes as Hezbollah strongholds targeted
content: Israeli airstrikes have killed Nabatiyeh Mayor Ahmad Kahil and others in southern Lebanon, marking an escalation in military operations against Hezbollah and Amal-held areas. Despite international criticism, including from the US, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu rejects calls for a ceasefire, emphasizing the necessity to push back Hezbollah forces from Israel's northern border.
summary: Israeli airstrikes have killed Nabatiyeh Mayor Ahmad Kahil and others in southern Lebanon, marking an escalation in military operations against Hezbollah and Amal-held areas. Despite international criticism, including from the US, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu rejects calls for a ceasefire, emphasizing the necessity to push back Hezbollah forces from Israel's northern border.

title: Fuel tanker explosion in Nigeria kills over 90
content: More than 90 people lost their lives and at least 50 were injured when a petro tanker exploded in Majiya village, Nigeria. The tanker was traveling from Portharcourt to Nguru and overturned, causing a spill that ignited. Villagers collecting the fuel perished in the ensuing fire, according to the Jigawa police.
summary: More than 90 people lost their lives and at least 50 were injured when a petro tanker exploded in Majiya village, Nigeria. The tanker was traveling from Portharcourt to Nguru and overturned, causing a spill that ignited. Villagers collecting the fuel perished in the ensuing fire, according to the Jigawa police.

title: 6.1 magnitude Earthquake strikes Eastern Turkey, reports EMSC
Who was Sukha Duneke? Canadian gangster whose murder has been blamed on Indian agents
content: Diplomatic tensions between India and Canada have risen after Canadian officials linked Indian agents to the killing of Sukhdool Singh Gill in Winnipeg. Gill, known as Sukha Duneke, was involved in organized crime and the Khalistan movement. He was gunned down allegedly on Indian instructions, which has further strained bilateral relations.
summary: Diplomatic tensions between India and Canada have risen after Canadian officials linked Indian agents to the killing of Sukhdool Singh Gill in Winnipeg. Gill, known as Sukha Duneke, was involved in organized crime and the Khalistan movement. He was gunned down allegedly on Indian instructions, which has further strained bilateral relations.

title: Cash-strapped Maldives removes 228 government appointees to cut costs
content: President Mohamed Muizzu announced the removal of 228 political appointees from Maldives' government ministries to reduce expenditure as part of the Economic Reform Agenda. The move aims to save money monthly and streamline operations. Muizzu has also been fostering economic reforms and enhancing collaboration with India, encouraging investment in sustainable ventures.
summary: President Mohamed Muizzu announced the removal of 228 political appointees from Maldives' government ministries to reduce expenditure as part of the Economic Reform Agenda. The move aims to save money monthly and streamline operations. Muizzu has also been fostering economic reforms and enhancing collaboration with India, encouraging investment in sustainable ventures.

title: Watch: Two giant pandas Bao Li and Qing Bao arrive in Washington National Zoo
content: Bao Li and Qing Bao, a panda pair, arrived at Washington, DC's National Zoo. They are part of a 10-year China-US breeding and research agreement. The pandas will undergo a 30-day quarantine before their public debut in January. Panda diplomacy has been a symbol of peace and friendship for China since 1957.
summary: Bao Li and Qing Bao, a panda pair, arrived at Washington, DC's National Zoo. They are part of a 10-year China-US breeding and research agreement. The pandas will undergo a 30-day quarantine before their public debut in January. Panda diplomacy has been a symbol of peace and friendship for China since 1957.

title: British photojournalist Paul Lowe stabbed in California, son charged with murder
content: British photojournalist Paul Lowe, famous for his conflict coverage, was fatally stabbed on a California hiking trail. His 19-year-old son, Emir Lowe, is charged with murder and is held with a $2 million bond. The tragic incident occurred in the San Gabriel Mountains near Stoddard Canyon Falls.
summary: British photojournalist Paul Lowe, famous for his conflict coverage, was fatally stabbed on a California hiking trail. His 19-year-old son, Emir Lowe, is charged with murder and is held with a $2 million bond. The tragic incident occurred in the San Gabriel Mountains near Stoddard Canyon Falls.

title: China refuses to renounce force over Taiwan, targets 'external interference'
content: China reaffirms the potential use of force in Taiwan, targeting external interference and separatists while committing to peaceful reunification. Following military drills, international support for Taiwan grows, especially from Washington. Taiwan's government rejects Beijing's claims, insisting its future is for its own people to decide.
summary: China reaffirms the potential use of force in Taiwan, targeting external interference and separatists while committing to peaceful reunification. Following military drills, international support for Taiwan grows, especially from Washington. Taiwan's government rejects Beijing's claims, insisting its future is for its own people to decide.

title: In letter to Israel, US warns of blocking military aid if it impedes humanitarian assistance to Gaza
content: The US has warned Israel it might withhold military aid if Israel doesn't improve humanitarian aid delivery to Gaza within 30 days. This follows concerns over the deteriorating conditions in Gaza, highlighted in a letter from US officials Antony Blinken and Lloyd Austin. The US urges Israel to increase aid trucks and open more crossings.
summary: The US has warned Israel it might withhold military aid if Israel doesn't improve humanitarian aid delivery to Gaza within 30 days. This follows concerns over the deteriorating conditions in Gaza, highlighted in a letter from US officials Antony Blinken and Lloyd Austin. The US urges Israel to increase aid trucks and open more crossings.

title: Watch: Russian survives over two months in inflatable boat on icy sea water; loses brother, nephew and 50kgs
content: Mikhail Pichugin survived over two months adrift in the Sea of Okhotsk, after his boat, intended for a whale-watching trip, went off course. The ordeal claimed the lives of his brother and 15-year-old nephew. Rescuers discovered Pichugin, severely weakened, after drifting approximately 1,000 kilometers from the starting point.
summary: Mikhail Pichugin survived over two months adrift in the Sea of Okhotsk, after his boat, intended for a whale-watching trip, went off course. The ordeal claimed the lives of his brother and 15-year-old nephew. Rescuers discovered Pichugin, severely weakened, after drifting approximately 1,000 kilometers from the starting point.

title: Elon Musk becomes 'mega donor' to Trump's 2024 campaign, contributing $75 million
content: Elon Musk has contributed $75 million to Donald Trump's 2024 presidential campaign through America PAC. This makes him a significant Republican mega donor. Musk's support has uplifted Trump's campaign, especially in key battleground states. Musk has shifted from supporting Democratic candidates to endorsing Trump. He has also appeared with Trump at a rally.
summary: Elon Musk has contributed $75 million to Donald Trump's 2024 presidential campaign through America PAC. This makes him a significant Republican mega donor. Musk's support has uplifted Trump's campaign, especially in key battleground states. Musk has shifted from supporting Democratic candidates to endorsing Trump. He has also appeared with Trump at a rally.

title: Israel-Gaza conflict could trigger global economic crisis, says World bank chief Ajay Banga
content: World Bank President Ajay Banga warns that the Israel-Gaza conflict's escalation could severely impact the global economy. He highlighted potential risks if the war extends to resource-rich regions. The World Bank has increased its financial support to the Palestinian Authority amid ongoing devastation and calls for broader international intervention to mitigate the crisis.
summary: World Bank President Ajay Banga warns that the Israel-Gaza conflict's escalation could severely impact the global economy. He highlighted potential risks if the war extends to resource-rich regions. The World Bank has increased its financial support to the Palestinian Authority amid ongoing devastation and calls for broader international intervention to mitigate the crisis.

title: 'Govt remains open to ...': What Canada's trade minister said on economic ties with India
content: Canadian trade minister Mary Ng affirmed Canada’s commitment to maintaining strong commercial ties with India despite recent diplomatic tensions. She reassured Canadian businesses of continued government support and emphasized balancing economic interests with the protection of Canadian citizens and adherence to the rule of law.
summary: Canadian trade minister Mary Ng affirmed Canada’s commitment to maintaining strong commercial ties with India despite recent diplomatic tensions. She reassured Canadian businesses of continued government support and emphasized balancing economic interests with the protection of Canadian citizens and adherence to the rule of law.

title: 'She'll cut her own path ...': Biden on Kamala Harris' Presidential vision
content: At a Democratic dinner, President Biden endorsed Kamala Harris for presidency, emphasizing her ability to carve a new path while remaining loyal. Biden contrasted her fresh perspective with Donald Trump's outdated, dishonest views. Harris, who took over Biden's nomination, faces GOP backlash but shows promise as a new leader, according to recent polls.
summary: At a Democratic dinner, President Biden endorsed Kamala Harris for presidency, emphasizing her ability to carve a new path while remaining loyal. Biden contrasted her fresh perspective with Donald Trump's outdated, dishonest views. Harris, who took over Biden's nomination, faces GOP backlash but shows promise as a new leader, according to recent polls.

title: Chinese aquarium criticised for using robot instead of real Whale Shark
content: Xiaomeisha Sea World in Shenzhen faced backlash for showcasing a mechanical whale shark after five years of renovations. Critics highlighted the robot's visible gaps and the high entry fee of $40, expressing disappointment on social media. The aquarium defended the decision, citing laws against trading live whale sharks, but visitors remained dissatisfied.
summary: Xiaomeisha Sea World in Shenzhen faced backlash for showcasing a mechanical whale shark after five years of renovations. Critics highlighted the robot's visible gaps and the high entry fee of $40, expressing disappointment on social media. The aquarium defended the decision, citing laws against trading live whale sharks, but visitors remained dissatisfied.

title: 'No one should go to jail for smoking weed': Harris promises to legalise recreational marijuana
content: Kamala Harris promises to legalize recreational marijuana if elected, emphasizing its disproportionate impact on Black men. She aims to work with Congress to ensure lawful cultivation, distribution, and possession of cannabis, and plans to support Black entrepreneurs through forgivable loans and better regulation.
summary: Kamala Harris promises to legalize recreational marijuana if elected, emphasizing its disproportionate impact on Black men. She aims to work with Congress to ensure lawful cultivation, distribution, and possession of cannabis, and plans to support Black entrepreneurs through forgivable loans and better regulation.

title: 'Possess, control, impregnate her': Olivia Nuzzi's ex-fiancé claims RFK jr manipulated her
content: Ryan Lizza claims Olivia Nuzzi had a toxic affair with RFK Jr., describes him as a sex addict who manipulated her. Nuzzi accuses Lizza of harassment and blackmail after he encouraged her to disclose the affair. Nuzzi, currently on leave, seeks a protective order against Lizza. RFK Jr. denies the accusations.
summary: Ryan Lizza claims Olivia Nuzzi had a toxic affair with RFK Jr., describes him as a sex addict who manipulated her. Nuzzi accuses Lizza of harassment and blackmail after he encouraged her to disclose the affair. Nuzzi, currently on leave, seeks a protective order against Lizza. RFK Jr. denies the accusations.

title: Over 800 US military veterans released under 'don’t ask, don’t tell' policy receive honorable discharges
content: More than 800 military personnel discharged under the “don’t ask, don’t tell” policy have had their service records upgraded to honorable discharges. This initiative, part of a review by defense secretary Lloyd Austin, aims to rectify past discrimination against LGBTQ service members in the US military.
summary: More than 800 military personnel discharged under the “don’t ask, don’t tell” policy have had their service records upgraded to honorable discharges. This initiative, part of a review by defense secretary Lloyd Austin, aims to rectify past discrimination against LGBTQ service members in the US military.

title: UN says Yemen risks being dragged into Mideast conflict that could spiral out of control
